languages.text: {n}Немигающий взгляд изучает ваше лицо.{/n} "Даже мудрейшие из царей и цариц ошибаются — так говорит Завет Паутины. Как и то, что следует сначала принять решение, и только потом отдавать приказ".
{n}She meets your eyes with her steady, unblinking gaze.{/n} "Even the wisest of rulers may err — so we learn from the Tenets. They also teach us to make decisions before giving orders, not after."
languages.original_text: {n}Немигающий взгляд изучает ваше лицо.{/n} "Даже мудрейшие из царей и цариц ошибаются — так говорит Завет Паутины. Как и то, что следует сначала принять решение, и только потом отдавать приказ".

traits.locale_text: {n}She studies your face with unblinking eyes.{/n} "Even the wisest of rulers may err — so we learn from Ahn'shini. The Way also teaches us to make decisions before giving orders, not after."
{n}She studies your face with unblinking eyes.{/n} "Even the wisest of rulers may err — so we learn from Ahn'shini. The Way also teaches us to make decisions before giving orders, not after."
{n}She meets your eyes with her steady, unblinking gaze.{/n} "Even the wisest of rulers may err — so we learn from the Tenets. They also teach us to make decisions before giving orders, not after."

{n}She meets your eyes with her steady, unblinking gaze.{/n} "Even the wisest of rulers may err — so we learn from Ahn'shini. The Way also teaches us to make decisions before giving orders, not after."
{n}She meets your eyes with her steady, unblinking gaze.{/n} "Even the wisest of rulers may err — so we learn from the Tenets. They also teach us to make decisions before giving orders, not after."

{n}She meets your eyes with her steady, unblinking gaze.{/n} "Even the wisest of rulers may err — so we learn from the Tenets. They also teach us to make decisions before giving orders, not after."

languages.text: {n}La asesina sostiene tu mirada sin pestañear.{/n} «Incluso el más sabio de los monarcas puede errar; o eso nos inculca la Doctrina. También nos enseña a tomar decisiones antes de impartir órdenes, nunca después».
languages.original_text: {n}She meets your eyes with her steady, unblinking gaze.{/n} "Even the wisest of rulers may err — so we learn from the Tenets. They also teach us to make decisions before giving orders, not after."

traits.locale_text: {n}La asesina sostiene tu mirada sin pestañear.{/n} «Incluso el más sabio de los monarcas puede errar; o eso nos inculca la Doctrina. También nos enseña a tomar decisiones antes de impartir órdenes, nunca después».

languages.text: {n}彼女は瞬きひとつせず、確かな眼差しであなたの目を見つめる。{/n}「誰よりも賢明な統治者であっても間違いを起こすことはある…教義からそう学ぶ。それはまた、命令を下した後ではなく、下す前に決断することを教えている」
languages.original_text: {n}She meets your eyes with her steady, unblinking gaze.{/n} "Even the wisest of rulers may err — so we learn from the Tenets. They also teach us to make decisions before giving orders, not after."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は瞬きひとつせず、確かな眼差しであなたの目を見つめる。{/n}「誰よりも賢明な統治者であっても間違いを起こすことはある…教義からそう学ぶ。それはまた、命令を下した後ではなく、下す前に決断することを教えている」

languages.text: {n}她以坚定的目光看着你，眼睛一眨不眨。{/n}“即便是最贤明的统治者也难免犯错，这是教义带给我们的启示。教义要求我们先做决定，再下命令，而非反其道而行。”
languages.original_text: {n}She meets your eyes with her steady, unblinking gaze.{/n} "Even the wisest of rulers may err — so we learn from the Tenets. They also teach us to make decisions before giving orders, not after."

traits.locale_text: {n}她以坚定的目光看着你，眼睛一眨不眨。{/n}“即便是最贤明的统治者也难免犯错，这是教义带给我们的启示。教义要求我们先做决定，再下命令，而非反其道而行。”

languages.text: {n}Sie begegnet deinem Blick wie immer ungerührt und ohne zu blinzeln.{/n} "Selbst die weisesten Herrscher können irren – so lehre es die Grundsätze. Und sie lehren uns auch, Entscheidungen zu treffen, bevor wir Befehle erteilen, nicht danach."
languages.original_text: {n}She meets your eyes with her steady, unblinking gaze.{/n} "Even the wisest of rulers may err — so we learn from the Tenets. They also teach us to make decisions before giving orders, not after."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie begegnet deinem Blick wie immer ungerührt und ohne zu blinzeln.{/n} "Selbst die weisesten Herrscher können irren – so lehre es die Grundsätze. Und sie lehren uns auch, Entscheidungen zu treffen, bevor wir Befehle erteilen, nicht danach."

languages.text: {n}Elle plante dans vos yeux son regard fixe et imperturbable.{/n} « Les dirigeants les plus éclairés eux-mêmes peuvent se tromper... C'est ce que nous enseignent les Préceptes. Ils nous apprennent également à prendre des décisions avant de donner des instructions, et non pas l'inverse. »
languages.original_text: {n}She meets your eyes with her steady, unblinking gaze.{/n} "Even the wisest of rulers may err — so we learn from the Tenets. They also teach us to make decisions before giving orders, not after."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle plante dans vos yeux son regard fixe et imperturbable.{/n} « Les dirigeants les plus éclairés eux-mêmes peuvent se tromper... C'est ce que nous enseignent les Préceptes. Ils nous apprennent également à prendre des décisions avant de donner des instructions, et non pas l'inverse. »

languages.original_text: {n}She meets your eyes with her steady, unblinking gaze.{/n} "Even the wisest of rulers may err — so we learn from the Tenets. They also teach us to make decisions before giving orders, not after."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, kararlı ve gözünü kırpmayan bakışını gözlerine dikiyor.{/n} "En bilge hükümdarlar bile hata yapar... İlkeler bize bunu öğretir. Ayrıca emir verdikten sonra değil, öncesinde karar vermemizi tembihler."
languages.original_text: {n}She meets your eyes with her steady, unblinking gaze.{/n} "Even the wisest of rulers may err — so we learn from the Tenets. They also teach us to make decisions before giving orders, not after."
